welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bozeman, Montana! Nestled in the heart of the Rockies, Bozeman is known for its outdoor adventures, vibrant arts scene, and friendly community. We invite you to explore our charming city and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bozeman Yellowstone International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is primarily used for domestic flights operated by major airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is primarily used for regional flights operated by smaller airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mission Field Airport handles all commercial flights and has various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Mission Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing a more personalized and exclusive experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
